description: This file initializes a PDF knowledge base with metadata, sets up a Milvus vector database, loads documents, and performs a filtered query using an agent.

classes.name: PDFKnowledgeBase
classes.description: Class for managing a PDF-based knowledge base with metadata.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Agent class for querying knowledge bases.

methods.name: download_knowledge_filters_sample_data
methods.description: Downloads sample PDF files for knowledge filtering.
